exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R x : R df : R_NormedModule H : is_derive f x df dg : R_NormedModule H0 : is_derive g x dg H1 : g x <> 0 Unable to unify "is_linear (fun y : R_AbsRing => scal y ((?M2376 * ?M2374 ?M2375 - ?M2373 ?M2375 * ?M2377) / ?M2374 ?M2375 ^ 2)) /\\ (forall x : AbsRing_NormedModule R_AbsRing, is_filter_lim (locally ?M2375) x -> is_domin (locally ?M2375) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule R_AbsRing => minus y x) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule R_AbsRing => minus (minus ((fun t : R => ?M2373 t / ?M2374 t) y) ((fun t : R => ?M2373 t / ?M2374 t) x)) ((fun y0 : R_AbsRing => scal y0 ((?M2376 * ?M2374 ?M2375 - ?M2373 ?M2375 * ?M2377) / ?M2374 ?M2375 ^ 2)) (minus y x))))" with "Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) / g (x + h) - f x / g x) / h) 0 = (Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) 0 * g x - f x * Lim (fun h : R => (g (x + h) - g x) / h) 0) / g x ^ 2".

original: intros. unfold Derive. unfold ex_derive in H, H0. destruct H as [df H]. destruct H0 as [dg H0]. intros. apply is_derive_div; auto.
